Name: SGN-CD19A
Use: acute lymphoblastic leukemia and B-cell non-Hodgkin lymphoma

Name: Lucatumumab[10]
Use: multiple myeloma, non-Hodgkin's lymphoma, Hodgkin's lymphoma

Name: Milatuzumab[10]
Use: multiple myeloma and other hematological malignancies

Name: Cetuximab
Use: metastatic colorectal cancer and head and neck cancer

Name: Nimotuzumab[45][108]
Use: squamous cell carcinoma, head and neck cancer, nasopharyngeal cancer, glioma

Name: Zalutumumab[22]
Use: squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck

Name: Citatuzumab bogatox[9]
Use: ovarian cancer and other solid tumors

Name: Figitumumab
Use: adrenocortical carcinoma, non-small cell lung carcinoma etc.

Name: Catumaxomab[22]
Use: ovarian cancer, malignant ascites, gastric cancer

Name: Etaracizumab
Use: melanoma, prostate cancer, ovarian cancer etc.

Name: Fresolimumab[80]
Use: idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis, focal segmental glomerulosclerosis, cancer
